articles.author: Ali Asgar Nalwala
articles.title: Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024: Get India results, scores and standings - Olympics
articles.description: The Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024 will run from February 13 to 18. Know the results, badminton scores, points table and standings of the Indian teams competing.
articles.content:
Glossary: MF - Matches For (total matches won), MA - Matches Against (matches lost), MD - Match Difference, GD - Games Difference
